attributes.action: ammend the RTA 1988 to simplify the insurance requirements for motor vehicles.
attributes.additional_details: The change I propose would make the vehicle insurance requirements in the UK simillar and simpler to match that of other countries such as mainland Europe, the main change is that only the VEHICLE is required to be insured against 3rd party risks as opposed to the complicated current system of VEHICLE + DRIVER. I believe this system is now outdated since this requirement has been present since the original RTA was passed into law in 1930. Motoring has changed a lot in the 94 years since.
attributes.background: Ammend the Road Traffic Act 1988 to simplify the requirements for mandatory motor vehicle insurance to make it easier for people to insure vehicles for a fairer price.

rejection.details:
